fullplot: A poor family in the Northeast of Brazil (Fabiano, the father; Sinhè Vitèria, the mother; their 2 children and a dog called Baleia) wander about the barren land searching for a better place to live, with food and work. But the drought and misery destroy their hopes.
plot: A poor family in the Northeast of Brazil (Fabiano, the father; Sinhè Vitèria, the mother; their 2 children and a dog called Baleia) wander about the barren land searching for a better place...
title: Barren Lives
